youtube:
Iji chọta ozi RTMP gị maka YouTube, banye na akaụntụ YouTube gị wee gaa CREATE> Gaa ndụ. Ị ga-ahụ ihuenyo na-esonụ:
{{youtubeLive}}
.Detuo "Stream URL" na fanye ya na "Tapawa RTMP URL ebe a" ubi. Na-esote, detuo "Stream igodo" na mado ya na "Stream igodo" ubi. Pịa "Gaa Live" ka ịmalite mgbasa ozi.
{{1000}
facebook:
Ị nwere ike ịkwanye na profaịlụ gị site na RTMP site na Facebook's Mepụta Live page (na ịpị Mepụta Live Stream) ma ọ bụ site na ịpị bọtịnụ Live na Mepụta mpaghara nke ibe ma ọ bụ profaịlụ nke ịchọrọ ịkwanye. A ga-akpọta gị na Facebook Live Producer.
Pịgharịa gaa n'okpuru ihe ọkpụkpọ nlele. Gbaa mbọ hụ na n'okpuru "Malite" na atọrọ menu ndọpụta ka Jiri igodo iyi. Ị ga-ahụ URL RTMP na Stream Key maka ebe a. (Rịba ama: A ka na-ahụ vidiyo gị n'akụkụ aka nri ala.) {{facebookLive}} Detuo " URL nkesa" wee tinye ya na mpaghara "Paste RTMP URL here". Na-esote, detuo "Stream igodo" na mado ya na "Stream igodo" ubi. Pịa "Gaa Live" ka ịmalite mgbasa ozi.
{{1000}
